text: Kathleen Barr (born April 6, 1967) is a Canadian voice actress. She is best known for voicing Marie Kanker and Kevin in Ed, Edd n Eddy and Trixie Lulamoon and Queen Chrysalis in My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic. She also voiced Henri Richard Maurice Dutoit LeFevbre in Liberty's Kids, Isis, and Delilah, in Krypto the Superdog. Dot Matrix in ReBoot, Kaiko Nekton in The Deep, Wheezie in Dragon Tales, Gelorum in Hot Wheels: AcceleRacers, and Sweetberry in My Little Pony. ==Other websites== * * Category:Living people Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Actors from Toronto Category:Actors from Vancouver Category:1967 births
title: Kathleen Barr
